column5: Wondering if anyone has any suggestions for a recommended contractor in the area. I have a couple projects I'm thinking of doing down the road. If you have someone to recommend please let me know or shoot me a PM.  Thank you.
Thanks I will look him up. Anyone else have a recommended suggestion?  Thanks!
Maybe posting the planned projects may help out. Some contractors are better at certain things for example an outside deck compared to a new basement washroom.
Those jobs require completely different skill sets & equipment. Better off with 2 different contractors.
